title: [Large-scale] Developing Critical Thinking in Technical and Vocational Education: Active Engagement Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic engineering knowledge and communication skills
context.additional_context: Conducted in a limited-technology environment (no PCs, smartphone-centric), measuring critical thinking skills through project-based assessments.

learning_goals: Learners enhance their ability to analyze and evaluate technical problems from multiple perspectives
Learners can present critical solutions to given problems through collaborative activities
Learners can systematically document and present critical thinking processes by applying real-life case studies

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
